record.jsxtip: Fires after the user presses the Enter key while this text box has focus.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
Key Press
record.jsxtip: Fires after a browser keypress event while this text box has focus.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
Key Down
record.jsxtip: Fires after a browser keydown event while this text box has focus.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
Key Up
record.jsxtip: Fires after a browser keyup event while this text box has focus.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires after the user edits the value of this text box and this text box loses focus. Canceling this event prevents the edit from occurring.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the value before the text box receives focus.
the new value.
Incr. Change
record.jsxtip: Fires after each key event that changes the value of this text box. This event fires only once after a key is held down to produce multiple characters. Canceling this event prevents the edit from occurring.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the value before the last key event.
the incrementally changed value.
Mouse Wheel
record.jsxtip: Fires after the user uses the mouse scroll wheel while the mouse is over this text box.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires after the user right-clicks this text box and before the bound context menu displays. Canceling this event prevents the menu from displaying.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the menu to display.
record.jsxreturntext: use this field to override the default menu with an instance of jsx3.gui.Menu.

record.jsxtip: Fires after this text box loses focus.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires after this text box gains focus.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires after the user double-clicks this text box.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires after this text box is removed from the DOM.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the parent of this text box before it is removed from the DOM.
